logoQuiz.proTip: Pro Tip: Images become clearer with each incorrect guess, making them easier to identify as you try!
logoQuiz.pageDescription: Test your knowledge of popular Nepali and international brand logos. How many can you recognize?
logoQuiz.title: Logo Chineu Ta?
logoQuiz.subtitle: Test your brand recognition skills
logoQuiz.multipleChoiceDesc: Choose the correct brand name from four options. Perfect for beginners!
logoQuiz.fillInBlankDesc: Type the full name of the brand. A more challenging mode for logo experts!
logoQuiz.howToPlay1: Look at the partially blurred logo and try to identify the brand
logoQuiz.howToPlay2: Select the correct answer from the multiple choice options or type your answer
logoQuiz.howToPlay3: Use hints if you get stuck
logoQuiz.howToPlay4: Try to get as many correct answers as possible

wouldYouRather.title: Yo ki Tyo?
wouldYouRather.description: Pick a Nepali scenario and see how your choice stacks up!
wouldYouRather.choosePrompt: Select an option to see how others voted
wouldYouRather.submitYourOwn: Have a great "Would You Rather" idea?
wouldYouRather.submitDescription: Submit your own questions for possible inclusion in the game! Your name will be featured in the game.
wouldYouRather.shareText: In "Would You Rather", I chose "{choice}" and {percentage}% of people agreed with me! Try it yourself!

Translations.districtDescription: Guess the district by its shape and test your knowledge of Nepal’s map!
Translations.binodWorth: Binod Chaudhary is Nepal's first billionaire with a net worth of approximately $1.8 billion.
Translations.binodBusiness: He is the chairman of CG Corp Global, which owns businesses ranging from food, electronics, to hospitality.
Translations.notEnoughMoney: Binod doesn't have enough Money! He is not Elon Musk.
Translations.feedbackDescription: We're working hard to improve this website every day. Your feedback means a lot to us and helps us make Piromomo better for everyone. Thank you for your support on this journey!
Translations.nepaliDateConverterDescription: Convert between Nepali and English dates seamlessly.
Translations.learnAboutKingsLink: Learn about the Kings of Nepal →
Translations.resultsMessage: You named {count} out of {total} kings.{isPerfect, select, true{ - Impressive knowledge of Nepal's history!} other{}}
Translations.shareScoreText: I named {count}/{total} Kings of Nepal in the Sporcle-style quiz on Piromomo! Can you beat my score? #NepalKingsQuiz
Translations.scoreCopiedAlert: Score copied to clipboard! Paste it to share.
Translations.firstofNepalSubtitle: Exploring the pioneering individuals who shaped Nepal's history with their groundbreaking achievements and remarkable firsts.
Translations.firstofNepalShortSubtitle: Who is the first to do what in Nepal? Find out.
Translations.searchPlaceholder: Search by name, category, or description...
Translations.noMatches: We couldn't find any matches for "{searchTerm}".

pattalagau.description: Test your Nepal geography knowledge in this location-finding game!

nepalGk.perfectScore: Perfect score! You're a Nepal expert!
nepalGk.greatScore: Great job! You know Nepal well!
nepalGk.goodScore: Good effort! Keep learning about Nepal!
nepalGk.finalScoreMessage: Your final score is {score} out of {total}.
nepalGk.title: General Knowledge - Nepal Edition
nepalGk.shortdescription: Test your General Knowledge about Nepal
nepalGk.description: Test your knowledge about Nepal with this quiz covering history, geography, culture, and more!
nepalGk.shareMessage: I scored {score} points in the Nepal General Knowledge Quiz{category}! Can you beat me? Try it at: {url} #NepalGK
nepalGk.clipboardMessage: Score copied to clipboard! Paste it to share.
nepalGk.noQuestionsInCategory: No questions available in this category.

nepalChecklist.title: Are you a real Nepali? Himalayan tales and tea addiction
nepalChecklist.subtitle: Prove your Nepali-ness with momos and chaos!
nepalChecklist.description: Try if you are a real Nepali.

Translations.tagline: Fun Side of Nepal You Didn't Know You Needed
Translations.nameDistrictDescription: Can you name all 77 districts of Nepal?
Translations.kingofNepalSubHeading: A chronological journey through the monarchs who shaped Nepal's history, from ancient rulers to the final kings of the Shah dynasty.
Translations.timeBonus: unused time bonus added to score
Translations.skipPenalty: Skipping penalty! -30 seconds for excessive skipping.
Translations.guessToReveal: Guess correctly to reveal district information
Translations.noInfoAvailable: No additional information available for this district.
Translations.footerText: © 2025 Nepal Districts Quiz - Learn about Nepal's geography and administrative divisions
Translations.quizInvitation: Now that you've explored the kings of Nepal, see how many you can remember in our interactive quiz.
Translations.quizInstructions: You have 5 minutes to name all {kingCount} kings who ruled Nepal from 1743 to 2008.
Translations.typeNamesInstruction: Type the names in any order. You have to match the full name with the correct kings.
Translations.title: Districts of Nepal
Translations.instructions: Try to name all 77 districts of Nepal by their shape on the map. Type the district name in the box and submit your guess.

guessFestival.title: Guess the Festival
guessFestival.description: Test your knowledge of Nepali festivals!
guessFestival.instructions: Read the clues and guess which Nepali festival is being described.

kingsOfNepal.title: Kings of Nepal
kingsOfNepal.description: Name all the kings who ruled Nepal
